prompt: Two adjacent, troublesome slices: A 4-matching on $W_5$ containing two full-index troublesome slices, $S$ (in {\color{red}{red}}) and $T$ (in {\color{blue}{blue}}), that are somewhat, but not almost disjoint. Notice that our algorithm can choose either the outer edge of $S$ or the outer edge of $T$, but not both.
